name: Willow's Quest
description:
Willow is late for his romantic date with Rachel.

Help him across 2 levels filled with puzzles and hazard traps before night arrives!

---

Made as a coding project for one of my programming classes, around December 2015.

Every asset was created using Unity cubes and spheres, including the main character, which was animated without a rig!

---

** Game is in Portuguese Portugal **

HOW TO PLAY:

- Open "Willow's Quest.Exe";

- Graphical Options - toggle with the "M" key and select your graphic effects;

CONTROLS:

- W,A,S,D to move Willow;

- Mouse to orbit camera;

- "E" key to interact with objects and grab cubes;

- "SPACE" to jump;

- "SHIFT" to run;

- "LMB" to fire an attack.

---

IDEAL RESOLUTION:

1920x1080 ( I had no idea how to make the canvas fit other resolutions back when I made the game)
